channel.title: 🏢 CREST - FairPlay, ENSAE Paris on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 CREST - FairPlay, ENSAE Paris on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Local and Adaptive Mirror Descents in Extensive-Form Games
item.description: LocalOMD: Adaptive OMD in extensive-form games achieves near-optimal sample complexity by using fixed sampling and local updates, reducing variance and generalizing well.
